tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE songs (
    song_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    song_name VARCHAR(255),
    artist VARCHAR(255),
    genre VARCHAR(50),
    release_year INT
);

CREATE TABLE songs (
  song_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  song_name VARCHAR(100),
  artist_name VARCHAR(100),
  genre_id INT REFERENCES music_genres(genre_id),
  playlist_id INT REFERENCES playlists(playlist_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Song (
    song_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    song_name VARCHAR(255),
    artist VARCHAR(255),
    duration INT,
    genre VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE Album (
    album_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    album_title VARCHAR(150) NOT NULL,
    release_date DATE,
    genre_id INT,
    artist_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (genre_id) REFERENCES Genre(genre_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (artist_id) REFERENCES Artist(artist_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Song (
    song_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    song_title VARCHAR(150) NOT NULL,
    duration INT,
    album_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (album_id) REFERENCES Album(album_id)
);
